userStories.title: User Authentication and Authorization
userStories.description: As a user, I want to securely log in to the system so that I can access my orders and account information
acceptanceCriteria: Users can register with email and password
Users can log in with valid credentials
Password reset functionality is available via email
Role-based access control distinguishes between customers and administrators
Session management is secure with appropriate timeout
Failed login attempts are tracked and limited
Passwords are hashed and stored securely

userStories.title: Create and Submit Orders
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to create and submit orders for products so that I can purchase items
acceptanceCriteria: Users can browse available products with images and descriptions
Users can add products to shopping cart
Users can specify quantity and product variants/options
Shopping cart persists across sessions
Order summary displays all items, quantities, and total price
Users can apply discount codes
Confirmation email is sent after successful order submission
Order is saved to database with unique order ID

userStories.title: View and Track Orders
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to view my order history and track current orders so that I know the status of my purchases
acceptanceCriteria: Users can view a list of all their orders sorted by date
Order details page shows all items, quantities, prices, and status
Real-time order status is displayed (Pending, Processing, Shipped, Delivered, Cancelled)
Tracking information is available for shipped orders
Users can filter orders by status and date range
Users can search orders by order ID or product name
Email notifications are sent when order status changes
Order timeline shows status change history

userStories.title: Order Management for Administrators
userStories.description: As an administrator, I want to manage all orders in the system so that I can fulfill customer requests efficiently
acceptanceCriteria: Admins can view all orders in the system with pagination
Admins can search and filter orders by multiple criteria
Admins can update order status with reason/notes
Admins can cancel orders with refund processing
Admins can generate order reports (daily, weekly, monthly)
Admins receive real-time notifications for new orders
Admins can export order data to CSV/Excel
Dashboard shows key metrics (total orders, pending, revenue)

userStories.title: Product Catalog Management
userStories.description: As an administrator, I want to manage the product catalog so that customers can order the correct and available items
acceptanceCriteria: Admins can add new products with details (name, description, price, SKU)
Admins can upload multiple product images
Admins can update product details and pricing
Admins can set product availability (in stock, out of stock)
Products can be organized into categories and subcategories
Admins can set product variants (size, color, etc.)
Admins can manage inventory quantities
Products can be marked as featured or on sale
Search engine friendly URLs are generated for products
